verbs.description: If Donald Trump [V: did] build an immigration wall , it would cost billions . Would it be worth the money ?
If [ARG0: Donald Trump] did [V: build] [ARG1: an immigration wall] , it would cost billions . Would it be worth the money ?
If Donald Trump did build an immigration wall , it [V: would] cost billions . Would it be worth the money ?
[ARGM-ADV: If Donald Trump did build an immigration wall] , [ARG1: it] [ARGM-MOD: would] [V: cost] [ARG2: billions] . Would it be worth the money ?
If Donald Trump did build an immigration wall , it would cost billions . [V: Would] it be worth the money ?
If Donald Trump did build an immigration wall , it would cost billions . [ARGM-MOD: Would] [ARG1: it] [V: be] [ARG2: worth the money] ?
